title: YouTube Revision Panel – Smart Playlist Revision Tool
shortDescription: A smart Chrome extension that lets learners mark important playlist moments with timestamps and revise them later using a clean, movable revision panel.
overview: YouTube Revision Panel is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to help learners revise important moments from YouTube playlist videos. It allows users to mark videos at exact timestamps, automatically save them, and revisit them later through a clean, draggable revision panel—making learning from long playlists organized, efficient, and stress-free.
whatUsersCanDo: Mark important moments in playlist videos
Save exact timestamps automatically for later revision
View all marked videos in a playlist-specific revision panel
Resume videos with one click from saved time
Unmark videos once revision is completed
Drag, minimize, or move the panel while studying
whyIBuiltThis: Revising long YouTube playlists is often unorganized and inefficient. Important explanations are easy to forget without proper timestamps, and manual note-taking interrupts focus. I built this tool to make YouTube-based learning structured, efficient, and revision-friendly.
features: Mark videos at the current timestamp with one click
Automatically saves exact revision time
Playlist-specific Revision Panel for organized revision
One-click resume from saved timestamps
Unmark videos after revision
Draggable and minimizable panel
Clean dark UI for comfortable studying
Works after page reload and browser restart
futurePlans: Enhance UI animations and transitions
Add export/import of revision data
Cloud sync support
Keyboard shortcut support
Analytics for revision tracking

title: EduGuide – Smart Teacher Discovery & Guidance Platform
shortDescription: A smart platform that helps college students quickly find the right teachers for academic and research guidance—based on specialization, availability, and expertise.
overview: EduGuide is a smart platform designed to help college students quickly find the right teachers based on specialization, availability, and research interests. It simplifies academic and research guidance by providing centralized, real-time access to teacher information.
whatUsersCanDo: Search teachers based on department, specialization, or availability
View detailed teacher profiles including research interests and contact details
Check real-time availability to plan meetings without confusion
Find office locations and timings easily
Save time and avoid miscommunication while seeking academic or research guidance
whyIBuiltThis: I built EduGuide to solve the common problem students face while finding the right teacher for guidance. Students often waste time manually checking availability and specializations, and miscommunication about office hours is frequent. This platform creates a single, easy-to-use system for smooth student–teacher interaction.
features: Detailed Teacher Profiles with specialization, qualifications, research areas, contact details, and office location
Real-Time Availability Tracking to view free slots and avoid scheduling conflicts
Advanced Search & Filters to find teachers by department, specialization, and availability
Live Data Sync for instant updates across all devices
Easy & Centralized Access to all teacher information in one platform
futurePlans: Booking System – Book appointment slots directly with teacher approval
AI Study Assistant – Smart study tips and resource recommendations based on courses

title: OpenForge – Community-Driven Open-Source Collaboration Platform
shortDescription: An open-source platform where developers share ideas, collaborate on projects, and turn concepts into real community-driven products.
overview: OpenForge is a community-driven open-source platform where developers can share ideas, collaborate on projects, and build real products together. It provides a single space for turning ideas into maintained open-source projects, encouraging transparent collaboration, community ownership, and collective growth.
whatUsersCanDo: Share open-source project ideas with the community
Explore and upvote ideas they find useful or interesting
Join ongoing projects as contributors or collaborators
Collaborate openly through discussions and shared development
Build and grow together in a community-driven environment
whyIBuiltThis: Many developers have strong ideas but no common place to build them collaboratively. Open-source ideas often never turn into real projects due to lack of contributors and structure. OpenForge creates a unified space where ideas evolve into maintained, community-owned open-source products.
features: Idea Sharing – Post, explore, discuss, and upvote open-source project ideas
Project Collaboration – Join projects, contribute code, and work with defined roles
Community-Driven Development – Public discussions and transparent roadmaps
Open-Source Platform – Fully open codebase with community contributions
Developer Networking – Connect with like-minded developers and grow together
futurePlans: Build a strong in-platform developer community
Enable structured discussions and idea validation features
Community-led project ownership and moderation system
Encourage long-term collaboration and sustainable open-source growth

title: TODO App – Offline Task Management with Flutter
shortDescription: A simple offline-first TODO app built with Flutter and Hive to manage daily tasks quickly and efficiently.
overview: TODO App is a simple and efficient task management application built using Flutter and Hive database. It allows users to organize daily tasks, set deadlines, and manage TODOs with a clean interface and offline-first functionality, ensuring fast performance and reliable access anytime.
whatUsersCanDo: Create and manage daily TODOs
Edit or delete tasks anytime
Set deadlines for important work
Use the app completely offline
Organize tasks quickly with a clean UI
whyIBuiltThis: I built this project to strengthen my Flutter development skills, experiment with offline-first architecture using Hive, simplify daily task management, and practice CI/CD implementation using GitHub Actions.
features: Add, update, and delete tasks easily
Set deadlines for important TODOs
Offline-first storage using Hive
Clean and simple UI for smooth usage
Fast performance with lightweight design
futurePlans: Add task categories and tags
Implement task priority levels
Add local notifications for deadlines
Dark mode improvements and UI enhancements

title: Vakeel Diary – Digital Legal Practice Management System
shortDescription: A simple and powerful legal practice management app that helps Indian advocates organize cases, track hearings, and manage client information efficiently.
overview: Vakeel Diary is a digital legal practice management app built for Indian advocates to manage cases, track court hearings, and organize client information efficiently. With offline-first functionality, hearing reminders, and PDF export support, it simplifies daily legal operations and enhances productivity.
whatUsersCanDo: Add and manage cases with client and court details
Track daily and upcoming hearings easily
Generate and share PDFs like causelists and case histories
Use the app offline without internet dependency
Switch languages between English and Hindi
whyIBuiltThis: I built Vakeel Diary to simplify daily case and hearing management for Indian advocates. Many legal professionals rely on manual tracking and paperwork, which can lead to missed dates and inefficiencies. This app provides a secure, offline-first solution to help lawyers stay organized and stress-free.
features: Case Management – Store and organize case details, clients, and court information
Hearing Tracker – Track daily hearings and upcoming court dates
PDF Exports – Generate causelists and case reports instantly
Offline-First – Access all data without internet
Multi-Language Support – Available in English and Hindi
Clean Interface – Simple, distraction-free design for legal professionals
futurePlans: Advocate Calendar – Visual calendar to track hearings, court holidays, and meetings
Advanced Client Management – Complete client directory with documents and case history
Expanded Multi-Language Support – Add more regional Indian languages
Smart Notifications – Timely alerts for hearings and deadlines
Dark Mode Support – Battery-friendly dark interface

title: Babua LMS – Cohort-Based Learning Management Platform
shortDescription: A cohort-based learning platform that offers structured, high-quality education for free, with optional paid career support to help learners grow and succeed.
overview: Babua LMS is a cohort-based learning platform designed to provide structured, high-quality education completely free of cost. It organizes learning into cohorts, modules, and lessons, giving students a clear path without confusion. Optional paid career services such as mentorship, mock interviews, and job support are available for learners who want deeper guidance.
whatUsersCanDo: Join learning cohorts and access structured courses
Watch lessons in a guided sequence
Learn for free without any paywalls
Choose optional career services like mentorship or mock interviews
Track progress through modules and lessons
whyIBuiltThis: I built Babua LMS to solve the problem of scattered and unstructured free learning resources. Many students lack clear learning paths and consistency, and most platforms force paid subscriptions. This platform keeps education free while offering optional career support for those who need it.
features: Cohort-Based Learning with structured courses and guided flow
Module & Lesson System for organized and step-by-step learning
Free Access to All Learning Content without restrictions
Admin Panel to manage courses, modules, and lessons dynamically
Clean & Distraction-Free UI focused on learning
Optional Paid Career Services like mentorship and mock interviews
futurePlans: Introduce discussion forums for cohort interaction
Add certification generation system
Implement performance analytics and progress insights
Expand career services with placement partnerships
